page.title: Talks and workshops
page.content:
I love what I do and talk about it as often as I can. Here is a selection of talks and workshops I've given recently:

2019

  • Guest lecture at EBS in Oestrich-Winkel on how to finance your startup.
  • Workshop on how not to fuck up your startup at Start Nuremberg-Erlangen.
  • Mentor at 3 Day Startup Germany, a startup weekend. WHU, Vallendar, Germany.
  • Jury member at Road to Start Summit in Nuremberg, Germany.

2018

  • Interview on German radio at SWR2 Tandem Rakete
  • "Introduction to Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence" at Pioniergeist in a workshop for Daimler HR executives. Stuttgart, Germany.
  • Presenting First Momentum Ventures at Start Summit, a student entrepreneurship conference. St. Gallen, Switzerland.
  • "How to build a product users love" at 3 Day Startup Germany, a startup weekend. WHU, Vallendar, Germany.
  • Presenting First Momentum Ventures at VC-BW, a German VC forum. Stuttgart, Germany.

2017

  • Presenting First Momentum Ventures at the annual ifex conference. Bad Boll, Germany.
  • "Automating stuff with Python" at Foundersclub Freiburg. Freiburg, Germany.
  • "Meet the founder: Karl Lorey, First Momentum" at PionierGarage. Karlsruhe, Germany.
  • "Getting Momentum with First Momentum" at Foundersclub Freiburg. Freiburg, Germany.
  • "How to build your first website in 8 hours" at Business meets Tech, a student initiative at WHU. WHU, Vallendar, Germany.

2016

  • TEAL: Transparent Encryption for the Database Abstraction Layer at CAiSE 2016, Ljubljana, Slovenia
  • From idea to founder at KIT Venture Fest, a conference on innovation and startups at KIT. Karlsruhe, Germany.
  • several tech workshops at PionierGarage, the student entrepreneurship club at KIT. (Crawling, SQL, Python, HTML). Karlsruhe, Germany.

Older (selection)

  • Presenting Road Genius at Volkswagen IT Symposium in front of C-level executives including then-CEO Winterkorn. Wolfsburg, Germany.
